error_access_denied: Error: No permission to access directory '{0}'.
ls_help: Shows the contents of the directory.
rm_help: Deletes the specified file or directory.
project_help: Creates a new project with the specified template. Options: --minimal, --README.
readme_created: README.md file created in the project directory.
project_structure_created: Project structure for '{0}' created with template '{1}'.
ls_option_help: Displays the contents of the current directory. Options: --color.
ls_color_help: Colors the output to highlight different file types.

project_options.--minimal: Creates only the basic files without additional templates.
project_options.--README: Creates a README file. By default, a README file is created.

help_description: Use the 'help [command]' command to get detailed help for a specific command.
ls_no_arguments: No arguments were provided. Please specify a path.
invalid_command: Invalid command. Type 'help' for a list of available commands.
todo_add_help: --add [task]   Adds a task to the Todo list.
todo_remove_help: --remove [task]   Removes a task from the Todo list.
todo_list_help: --list   Lists all tasks in the Todo list.
backup_help: Creates and restores backups for directories and files. Options: --create, --restore.
backup_create_help: --create [directory]   Creates a backup of the specified directory.
backup_restore_help: --restore [directory]   Restores a backup of the specified directory.
diff_help: Compares two files and shows the differences. Usage: diff [file1] [file2].
